content: The Army Reserve's Employer Partnership program is a great program for Army Reserve Soldiers that have become unemployed due to the current situation in America. Unfortunately, whats not being said about this particular article is that US Customs and Border Protection have specific requirements for applicants that involve age, skillset and in the case of Army Reserve soldiers, deployment time and where. This message is deceiving in that it gives unemployed soldiers the impression that they will get hired just because they are Army Reservists. The article needs to be re-written or pulled from circulation in the news.

title: U.S. Army Reserve, Customs and Border Protection Launch Jobs Partnership
